about_the_game:
CREATE YOUR LEGACY

Striker Manager 3 is the best multiplayer football manager game that combines the fun of traditional football games with the ability to own your in-game assets.

Generate income by trading your in-game assets, get your plot in the world of Striker Manager 3 and become the real owner of your club..

BUILD A FOOTBALL EMPIRE

In Striker Manager 3 you are not just a player, you are a true owner and creator of your own world. Each user manages a unique plot where you can build from scratch whatever you want to make your plot grow in value and beauty.

COMPETE AGAINST REAL MANAGERS

Compete daily against real opponents from all over the world and climb to the top of the Striker Manager 3 league. Each season lasts two months and you will have to face promotions and relegations depending on your team's performance. You will also compete in the Striker Cup and you will be able to organize private leagues to play online soccer matches against your friends.

SHOW YOUR TACTICAL SKILLS

Make your mark and define how your team will play using the advanced tactical tools that Striker Manager 3 puts at your fingertips. Is your football style based on counterattacking or do you prefer to keep possession of the ball? Talented players or physical wonders? Show us your style of play.

EXPERIENCE REAL TIME 3D GAME PLAY

Our advanced match engine gives you the opportunity to feel every football match with passion and in real time. Take care of your fans and make them fall in love with your team to get great attendances at home matches.

STRIKER PASS

Striker Pass allows you to unlock rewards by reaching new levels (25 per season) of in-game experience. Rewards can be acquired through the free Striker Pass, or through the Striker Pass Exclusive (Reedem Ucoins). Reaching new experience levels will unlock a free reward (not all levels have free rewards) and, if you have the Striker Pass Exclusive, you will always unlock an exclusive reward in each level.
